name: BBQ Cauliflower Wings
description: BBQ Cauliflower Wings are such a perfect appetizer or snack for game day. Made with a handful of ingredients, these will keep everyone coming back for more!
recipeIngredient: 18 ounces your favorite barbecue sauce OR Quick and Easy Vegan Barbecue Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and cut cauliflower into bite sized pieces. I like to leave some of the cauliflower stem on each piece, it makes them easier to pick up when eating.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash and cut cauliflower into bite sized pieces. I like to leave some of the cauliflower stem on each piece, it makes them easier to pick up when eating.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add water, flour, garlic and onion powder, and salt. Whisk until well combined. In a second, smaller bowl, add the panko breadcrumbs.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add water, flour, garlic and onion powder, and salt. Whisk until well combined. In a second, smaller bowl, add the panko breadcrumbs.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cauliflower to the batter in the large bowl, and toss to coat. Remove the pieces of cauliflower, one by one, and tap off the excess batter a few times on the side of the bowl. Roll them in the breadcrumbs, coating on all sides, and place on the prepared baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cauliflower to the batter in the large bowl, and toss to coat. Remove the pieces of cauliflower, one by one, and tap off the excess batter a few times on the side of the bowl. Roll them in the breadcrumbs, coating on all sides, and place on the prepared baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 15 minutes. Flip them over and bake for 10 more minutes, until brown and crispy. Remove from the oven.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 15 minutes. Flip them over and bake for 10 more minutes, until brown and crispy. Remove from the oven.

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the florets with 1 1/2 cups barbecue sauce to coat in a large bowl, then return to the pan. Put them back in the oven for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Toss the florets with 1 1/2 cups barbecue sauce to coat in a large bowl, then return to the pan. Put them back in the oven for 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the oven, brush with more barbecue sauce before serving, if desired. Serve with Vegan Ranch for dipping. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from the oven, brush with more barbecue sauce before serving, if desired. Serve with Vegan Ranch for dipping. Enjoy!

keywords: bbq cauliflower, vegan cauliflower wings, vegan party food
